study_info.title: Narrative Gravity Wells Analysis Dataset
study_info.description: Experimental data from LLM-based narrative analysis

llm_model.description: Large language model used for analysis

qa_confidence_score.description: Numerical confidence score from QA validation (0.0-1.0)

qa_anomalies_detected.description: Number of statistical anomalies detected during QA validation

qa_requires_second_opinion.description: Boolean indicating if analysis requires second opinion validation

qa_validation_summary.description: Human-readable summary of quality assessment results

qa_critical_issues.description: Number of critical QA issues detected (0 = no critical issues)

qa_passed_threshold.description: Boolean indicating if analysis passed minimum confidence threshold
